steps.name: Given  I have a set of user credentials of "invalid.api.email" and "invalid.api.password" and "8914e4bcde2eed17b537f68e942e0471e"
When  I send a POST request to the sign-in endpoint with these credentials
Then  I should receive a response with status code 401
And  Response body should have "Invalid login or password"
